LanguageData.CotMG_WarningText: Suddenly something covered the sun. A huge spaceship came into view and swept over you, dropping something nearby. The few seconds that it was visible were enough for you to remember what it was. Destroyers of worlds, devourers of planets, machines that bring death and destruction. Even the legendary Mechanoids didn't risk crossing paths with them. Sweat covered your face and your hands trembled.\nIs it over?
